title: South Australia

Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Coober Pedy (S. Aust.) - Description and travel
description: Episode of Series "Holiday". Visit the rich, fertile Barossa Valley, trek into the outback, enjoy the spectacular view from Mt Lofty House in the Adelaide Hills beautifully restored after the 1983 Ash Wednesday bush fires, visit the Gawler Ranges and the seaside town of Victor Harbour, charter a yacht at Port Lincoln, explore the heritage buildings in the mining town of Burra, journey by train from Adelaide to Alice Springs on the legendary Ghan, stay in an underground hotel in the opal mining town of Coober Pedy and finally enjoy a boat trip at Coorong.
